Bonham Carter, Helena.translation[0].def: (1966â€“)  a British actress who is known especially for appearing in films which are based on famous works of literature by writers such as E.M. Forster, Henry James, and George Orwell. Her films include Howards End,  The Wings of the Dove, and Keep the Aspidistra Flying. She has also played modern parts in films such as Fight Club.
